means.word_mean: 1. a member of a people who speak Uighur and live in Xinjiang and adjacent areas
2. the Turkic language spoken by approximately 7,000,000 Uighur people in extreme northwestern China
3. the script (derived from Aramaic) used to write the Uighur language
